QuestData.Title: Resource Drain
QuestData.Description:
Usually repairs easy. Anima everywhere!
Except drought means we can't just pull it from air. Other sources needed!
Take this. Drain anima from cloudstriders. Not ideal, but desperate times.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drain anima from Gilded Cloudstriders $1oa times.
QuestData.RewardText: This is enough to repair Gatamatos, and then some!
